short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was created to override the new tab with the time zone of home and your current location.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
If you are traveling while you use your laptop? Or you love someone away in a different timezone. Or maybe you are digitalnomad, This extension was created for you to override the new tab page to show:

[‚úì] ‚è∞ Current time of your current city.
[‚úì] ‚úàÔ∏è One more current time in a different timezone. (You can choose the other timezone by yourself).
[‚úì] üåÑ Showing a random image as background of each new tab. The photos will be related to your current city or state. So you can discover the beauty of your city.
[‚úì] üåö Dark mode. This feature for your eyes.

Road map:
[  ] Cache the photos and show them more than once from cached result.
[  ] Show one folder of the bookmarks on the body of the tab. (folder will be configurable by the user).
[  ] Show indicator if it's still work time there (in the different timzone).

For any feedback, please submit it here:
https://airtable.com/shrTcgUmZ92kpTbbx

Best,
